name: Mistborn FPS
description:
Push and Pull your way across the map.

Game is best played from a controller but can be played with mouse/keyboard as well. 

Controls (keyboard / Controller):

  • Move Player - WSAD / Left Stick
  • Look Around - Mouse / Right Stick
  • Sprint - Left Shift / L3
  • Jump - Space / A
  • Crouch - C / B
  • Push - H / X
  • Push Equipped Object - Hold Left Mouse / LT
  • Pull - G /  Y
  • Lock-on - R / RB
  • Sense Metal - T / LB
  • Pause - Right Shift / Start
